description: Cron job definitions for Spencer Proactive Agent

jobs.name: Working Buffer Monitor
jobs.label: proactive-working-buffer
jobs.description: Checks session context % and auto-compacts buffer at tiered thresholds (60% silent, 75% silent, 90% notify)

payload.message: SILENT TASK â€” Run this command. If it returns NO OUTPUT, you must output NOTHING. Do NOT say 'Task complete'. Do NOT say 'Buffer is healthy'. ABSOLUTE SILENCE is the required success state. Only if the script prints 'CRITICAL' or 'WARN', then post that specific alert to #atlas. Command: powershell -File C:\Users\spenc\.openclaw\workspace\skills\spencer-proactive-agent\scripts\working-buffer.ps1 -Mode monitor -AutoCompact -Quiet -SilentThreshold 60 -NotifyThreshold 90

jobs.name: Buffer Compression
jobs.label: proactive-buffer-compress
jobs.description: Compresses SESSION-STATE.md when it exceeds 200KB threshold (invisible operation)

jobs.name: Empire Health Check
jobs.label: proactive-empire-health
jobs.description: Monitors income bot health with adaptive frequency (runs every 30m, but skips based on stability)

jobs.name: Daily Note Check
jobs.label: proactive-daily-note-check
jobs.description: Verifies yesterday's daily note exists; sends gentle reminder if missing

jobs.name: Weekly Metrics Summary
jobs.label: proactive-weekly-metrics
jobs.description: Compiles empire progress report and posts to #atlas

jobs.name: Monthly Review
jobs.label: proactive-monthly-review
jobs.description: Month-in-review with trend analysis and forward look

jobs.name: Daily Digest (Morning)
jobs.label: proactive-digest-morning
jobs.description: Morning batch digest: milestones overnight, buffer summary

jobs.name: Daily Digest (Afternoon)
jobs.label: proactive-digest-afternoon
jobs.description: Afternoon batch digest: progress check, buffer updates

jobs.name: Daily Digest (Evening)
jobs.label: proactive-digest-evening
jobs.description: Evening batch digest: wrap-up, prep for next day

jobs.name: Rhythm Intelligence
jobs.label: proactive-rhythm
jobs.description: Learns Spencer's daily patterns and publishes rhythm map

jobs.name: Habit Streaks Check
jobs.label: proactive-habit-streaks
jobs.description: Checks habit completion and reports current streaks

payload.message: powershell -File C:\Users\spenc\.openclaw\workspace\skills\spencer-proactive-agent\scripts\habit-streaks.ps1 -HabitName exercise; powershell -File C:\Users\spenc\.openclaw\workspace\skills\spencer-proactive-agent\scripts\habit-streaks.ps1 -HabitName writing; powershell -File C:\Users\spenc\.openclaw\workspace\skills\spencer-proactive-agent\scripts\habit-streaks.ps1 -HabitName learning

jobs.name: Auto-Obsidian Sync
jobs.label: proactive-obsidian-sync
jobs.description: Syncs memory notes and TASKS.md to Obsidian vault

jobs.name: Skill Auto-Registration
jobs.label: proactive-skill-register
jobs.description: Scans skills/ and updates registry.json

jobs.name: Personal Dashboard Generation
jobs.label: proactive-dashboard-generate
jobs.description: Generates HTML dashboard with TL;DR metrics grid (every 30 min)

jobs.name: Buffer Rotation
jobs.label: proactive-buffer-rotate
jobs.description: Archives old working buffer and starts fresh

jobs.name: Wellness Harmony
jobs.label: proactive-wellness-harmony
jobs.description: Coordinates with self-care reminders to prevent notification conflicts

jobs.name: Wiki Sync
jobs.label: proactive-wiki-sync
jobs.description: Syncs docs to Obsidian wiki vault

jobs.name: Empire Registry Update
jobs.label: proactive-empire-registry
jobs.description: Updates PROJECTS.md and flags stale projects

jobs.name: Spencer Metrics
jobs.label: proactive-spencer-metrics
jobs.description: Collects Spencer-centric KPIs (deep work, daily notes, buffer health)

jobs.name: Experiment Runner
jobs.label: proactive-experiment-runner
jobs.description: Evaluates ongoing micro-experiments and reports status

jobs.name: Weekly Sprint Summary
jobs.label: proactive-weekly-sprint
jobs.description: Comprehensive weekly review: projects, metrics, next week focus
